scripts.deadlink-check: bash -c 'if [ ! -d "_site" ]; then echo "Error: _site directory not found. Please run \"quarto render\" first."; exit 1; fi; echo "Starting HTTP server on port 5528..."; python3 -m http.server 5528 --directory _site > /dev/null 2>&1 & SERVER_PID=$!; trap "kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null" EXIT; sleep 3; echo "Checking for broken links..."; if wget --spider --recursive --no-parent --no-check-certificate http://localhost:5528/ 2>&1; then echo "\nSuccess: No broken links found!"; kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null; exit 0; else echo "\nError: Broken links detected!"; kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null; exit 1; fi'
